job_tasks.phrase: guide the development of our Conversational AI foundation, integrating it across various tools and platforms (such as communication systems and IDEs)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes guiding the development process and integrating AI capabilities into existing software systems and platforms, which aligns with building and integrating software solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: drive the development of AI-driven Proofs of Concept (POCs) tailored to the needs of our group of companies
job_tasks.justification: While 'AI-driven' is mentioned, the core task is 'development of POCs', implying the creation of the proof-of-concept software or systems, fitting within software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide technical direction and leadership to developers and AI engineers
job_tasks.justification: The coding book explicitly lists 'Provide technical leadership' under this category, indicating guidance and direction in software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive architecture and design of scalable and maintainable AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the fundamental software engineering practice of designing robust and scalable systems, applied here to AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure code quality and reduce technical debt
job_tasks.justification: These are standard software engineering practices focused on the maintainability and quality of the codebase.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with product managers to translate business goals into technical requirements
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding business needs and converting them into actionable technical specifications, aligning with business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Facilitate communication between development team and stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to interpersonal skills and managing communication flows between different groups.

job_tasks.phrase: Mentor and coach team members, providing regular feedback
job_tasks.justification: Mentoring and coaching are key aspects of team collaboration and development.

job_tasks.phrase: Oversee development lifecycle, from planning to deployment and maintenance
job_tasks.justification: This describes the management of the entire software development process, a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure timely delivery of high-quality software solutions
job_tasks.justification: This focuses on project delivery and quality assurance within the software development context.

job_tasks.phrase: Encourage a culture of experimentation and learning
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the importance of continuous learning and exploration, fitting the adaptability category.

soft_skills.phrase: collaborate closely with product management, design, and other stakeholders
fostering a culture of technical excellence, continuous improvement, and customer-focused innovation
Facilitate communication between development team and stakeholders
Mentor and coach team members, providing regular feedback
Encourage a culture of experimentation and learning

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks such as guiding development, integration, architecture, design, code quality, and overseeing the development lifecycle. While the domain is AI (Conversational AI, AI-driven POCs), the core responsibilities and expected outputs are software-centric, fitting the definition of building or maintaining software that uses AI models as a core part of its functionality. There are no explicit tasks related to specialized AI/ML model development, fine-tuning, or prompt engineering, which would be characteristic of Core GenAI or ML Engineer roles.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed, explicitly outlining responsibilities that fall under core software engineering practices within an AI context. The title 'Senior Software Engineer' and the described tasks strongly align with the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile, with no ambiguity or conflicting information.
